presentation.intro:
My name is Sebastien Correaud and I'm an Web IT Engineer in Montpellier (HÃ©rault) in the areas of open source and cross-platform. I joined the CGI's Webfactory Team (formerly Logica) for analysis and development tasks within various web projects, with a technologic LAMP platform (eZ Publish, Drupal, Symfony).
Subsequently I have contributed to the birth and evolution of a mobile development pole (iOS, HTML5 Cross-Platform, Android)
I also contribute to the evolution of the Webfactory team by achieving various missions like training junior staff, technical audits and technology watch.

computer.title: Computer science
computer.text:
In the world of new technologies for 4 years, I wish to continue in this domain and use my web experience in management to target a technical expert career.
Mainly interested in evolution through a JavascriptFront-end Developer Front-end experience (full stack Node.JS, AngularJS, Express), I would improve myself by step to reach my goal.

skills.presentation: Here is a syntactic presentation of my skills.

realisations.zori:
A musics sharing's website in real time.
Using Firebase as storage and server push, and AngularJS, RequireJS to the front-end site.
realisations.zorios: iPhone version of Zori (for the front-end part).
realisations.knov:
A knowledge sharing's website in real time.
Using Firebase as storage and server push, and AngularJS, RequireJS to the front-end site.

study.intro: Following my degree, I opted for studies in the IT domain

bac.name: Scientific BA levels
bac.place: "Plaine de l'Ain" high school at Amberieu en Bugey

dut.name: BTEC Higher National Diploma in computer

one.title: Train journey : euro trip
one.presentation: My trip to Europe is a train journey that lasted 16 days and has taken me to six different countries, with different cultures compared to what I'm used to rub in France.

two.title: Flight : Iceland
two.presentation: Volcano, glaciers, geysers and other northern lights, visit of the most westerly European country and one of the most underestimated, overlooked of the French.

three.title: Train journey : the big cities of Europe
three.presentation:
Likely to appreciate big cities, it was completely logical that I venture into the visit of big cities, starting on the European continent.
Barcelona and Paris are both steps of this trip which will consider it others.

one.title: Flight : direction L.A.
one.presentation: California trip with a stopover in London on the way back and forth. Visit to London, Los Angeles and San Francisco for the first immersion in English-speaking countries.
